author: CTPPS
body:
backport of #22796 
(among others)

This PR backports the following three `master`/`10_2_X` PRs for TOTEM vertical timing detectors to be used very soon for the LHC high-* operations:
* #22796: raw-to-digi unpacker,
* #23101: geometry, and rechits producer,
* #23198: fixed detectors mapping.
This does not yet include the DQM (to be launched in a dedicated backport PR).

This follows the discussion triggered by @fabiocos in #23275.
title: TOTEM Timing detectors: backports for 10_1_X
